name: Selvage
description:
SELVAGE

You're a person who just found themselves in a dark and strange location with monsters coming at you that you can fight with fire arms you find along the way. Low on HP, low ammo or low mental health ? PTSD triggers, you go Berserk. You run faster and perform better, you just want to get out as fast as possible

Selvage is a first person shooter and also a school project made by students. Because of lack of time and various reasons, some assets are still missing.

"Doom ? No doom" Credit

GD : William Ferreira, Maxime Champroux, Alvi Frémont

GA : Angela Tran, Morgane Huynh-perez, Reda Lotfi

GP : Lucas Guichard, Léopold Leclerc, Clément Bostyn
